name: Ricky's Country Restaurant
address: 5978 Glover Rd, Langley City, BC V3A 4H9, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Big Buffalo-Style Wings
hasMenuItem.description: 10 big and meaty chicken wings fried to perfection and coated with your choice of sauce: sweet bourbon BBQ, hot, honey garlic, sweet teriyaki or salt & pepper. Served with carrots, celery and dipping sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Homestyle Turkey Dinner
hasMenuItem.description: Slow roasted turkey breast served with made-from-scratch rosemary focaccia apple stuffing, seasonal roasted vegetables, Yukon Gold mashed potatoes, poultry gravy, and cranberry sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Traditional Lasagna
hasMenuItem.description: Homestyle Italian meat sauce, loaded with Ricotta and Mozzarella, between fresh layered lasagna noodles. Oven baked, topped with shredded Parmesan and Mozzarella. Served with Piccolo Garlic Loaf and caesar salad.

hasMenuItem.name: Signature Tomato Basil Soup
hasMenuItem.description: Creamy, savoury and brimming with the rich flavours of ripe tomatoes and basil, topped with fresh made-from-scratch rosemary focaccia garlic croutons.

hasMenuItem.name: Classic Clubhouse (Since 1962)
hasMenuItem.description: House roasted turkey, maple bacon, lettuce, tomatoes and mayo on bread.

hasMenuItem.name: Southern-Style Chicken Tender Dinner
hasMenuItem.description: 6 pieces of premium chicken tenderloin, hand-battered in our secret southern-style recipe. Served with your choice of dipping sauce, coleslaw and crispy skin-on fries.

hasMenuItem.name: Famous Original
hasMenuItem.description: 6oz Alberta beef patty with American cheese.

hasMenuItem.name: Philly Cheesesteak
hasMenuItem.description: Melt-in-your-mouth AAA ribeye stacked high on a 10" artisan bun with sautéed peppers and onions, American and Swiss cheese, mayo, and au jus. More meat! More cheese!

hasMenuItem.name: Fettuccine Alfredo
hasMenuItem.description: Fettuccine in alfredo sauce with your choice of chicken or chorizo or prawns. Served with Piccolo Garlic Loaf.

hasMenuItem.name: Beer-Battered Fish & Chips
hasMenuItem.description: 2 pieces of hand-battered Ocean Wise cod fillets, dipped in our housemade beer batter and served with tartar sauce, coleslaw and crispy skin-on fries.

hasMenuItem.name: The Amazing Ginger Bowl
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy fried chicken tossed in citrus ginger sauce, with carrots and onions on chef’s rice topped with sesame and green onions. Served with naan bread.

hasMenuItem.name: Southern-Style Chicken Tenders (4 Pcs)
hasMenuItem.description: 4 pieces of premium chicken tenderloin, hand-battered in our secret southern-style recipe. Served with your choice of dipping sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Louisiana Pulled Pork Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Pulled pork with sweet bourbon BBQ sauce piled on a brioche bun, topped with southern style honey mustard coleslaw. Comes with crispy skin-on fries.

hasMenuItem.name: Radical Bacon Cheeseburger
hasMenuItem.description: Maple bacon and a three-cheese crisp, then even more three-cheese blend melted on our 6oz Alberta beef patty; with lettuce, fresh sliced tomato, crunchy onion tanglers and mayo.

hasMenuItem.name: Twisted Nachos
hasMenuItem.description: Deliciously crunchy corn tortilla chips, topped with tri-cheese, ranch dressing, tomatoes and green onions; served with a side of salsa for dipping.

hasMenuItem.name: Big Buffalo-Style Wings
hasMenuItem.description: 10 big and meaty chicken wings fried to perfection and coated with your choice of sauce: sweet bourbon BBQ, hot, honey garlic, sweet teriyaki or salt & pepper. Served with carrots, celery and dipping sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: So Good Pot Stickers
hasMenuItem.description: 6 pan fried chicken and vegetable dumplings.

hasMenuItem.name: Hand-Battered Fresh Fried Shrimp
hasMenuItem.description: 10 plump hand-battered fresh fried shrimp. Served with cocktail sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Southern-Style Chicken Tenders (4 Pcs)
hasMenuItem.description: 4 pieces of premium chicken tenderloin, hand-battered in our secret southern-style recipe. Served with your choice of dipping sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Crispy Skin-On Fries
hasMenuItem.description: Cooked to perfection.

hasMenuItem.name: Curly Fries
hasMenuItem.description: Seasoned with your choice of original or Cajun seasoning.

hasMenuItem.name: Onion Rings
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy rings served with sriracha ranch dipping sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Sweet Potato Fries
hasMenuItem.description: Served with Cajun garlic aioli.

hasMenuItem.name: Traditional Poutine
hasMenuItem.description: A true Canadian favourite with real cheese curds and gravy.

hasMenuItem.name: Signature Tomato Basil Soup
hasMenuItem.description: Creamy, savoury and brimming with the rich flavours of ripe tomatoes and basil, topped with fresh made-from-scratch rosemary focaccia garlic croutons.

hasMenuItem.name: Naan Bread (1 Bread)
hasMenuItem.description: Grilled with garlic butter. One order is made up of one naan bread cut into four pieces.

hasMenuItem.name: 4 Cheese Piccolo Garlic Loaf
hasMenuItem.description: A loaf of piccolo bread with garlic butter, Monterrey, cheddar, mozzarella, and Parmesan cheese.

hasMenuItem.name: Piccolo Garlic Loaf
hasMenuItem.description: A loaf of piccolo bread spread with garlic butter.

hasMenuItem.name: Supreme Caesar Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Shredded Parmesan, fresh made-from-scratch rosemary focaccia garlic croutons and a Parmesan crisp, with our signature caesar dressing. Served with Piccolo Garlic Loaf.

hasMenuItem.name: BLTC Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Maple bacon, 3 cheeses, tomatoes, green onions and chicken tenders on a garden greens salad blend, with dijon ranch dressing. Served with Piccolo Garlic Loaf.

hasMenuItem.name: Califresco Salad
hasMenuItem.description: A full seasoned chicken breast, field greens, quinoa, half an avocado, onions, tomatoes, cucumber, Feta cheese, topped with made in-house crispy corn tortilla strips. Served with maple lime turmeric dressing and Piccolo Garlic Loaf.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Po'boy
hasMenuItem.description: With southern-style fried chicken tenderloin, fully dressed with remoulade, maple Buffalo sauce, shredded lettuce, sliced tomatoes and pickle chips.

hasMenuItem.name: Fried Shrimp Po’boy
hasMenuItem.description: A 10" baguette with hand-battered fresh fried shrimp, dressed with remoulade, hot sauce, shredded lettuce, sliced tomatoes and pickle chips.

hasMenuItem.name: Classic Clubhouse (Since 1962)
hasMenuItem.description: House roasted turkey, maple bacon, lettuce, tomatoes and mayo on bread.

hasMenuItem.name: Philly Cheesesteak
hasMenuItem.description: Melt-in-your-mouth AAA ribeye stacked high on a 10" artisan bun with sautéed peppers and onions, American and Swiss cheese, mayo, and au jus. More meat! More cheese!

hasMenuItem.name: California Chicken
hasMenuItem.description: Grilled chicken breast, maple bacon, double slices of Pepper Jack cheese, smashed avocado, lettuce, tomato and mayo on a toasted multigrain bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Zorba the Greek Wrap
hasMenuItem.description: Seasoned grilled chicken breast, cucumbers, onions, tomatoes, and Feta cheese drenched with creamy tzatziki; stuffed in our artisan flatbread, then grilled.

hasMenuItem.name: Smokehouse Pulled Pork
hasMenuItem.description: Our famous smoked pulled pork piled high into a sweet bun with sautéed onions, mayo, honey gold BBQ sauce and served with coleslaw.

hasMenuItem.name: Reuben
hasMenuItem.description: Warmed corned beef, melted Swiss cheese and sauerkraut piled on Dijon-mayo brushed grilled rye.

hasMenuItem.name: Monte Cristo Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Thinly sliced Black Forest ham, in-house roasted turkey, double Swiss cheese, and wildberry aioli between 2 slices of brioche French toast! Served with your choice of crispy skin-on fries or Signature tossed salad.

hasMenuItem.name: Famous Original
hasMenuItem.description: 6oz Alberta beef patty with American cheese.

hasMenuItem.name: King Size Original
hasMenuItem.description: 8oz Alberta beef patty! Comes with your choice of cheese: American, Cheddar, Swiss, or Pepper Jack.

hasMenuItem.name: Old Style Bacon N' Cheddar
hasMenuItem.description: Maple bacon, double slices of Cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, relish and mayo.

hasMenuItem.name: California
hasMenuItem.description: Maple bacon, double slices of Pepper Jack cheese, smashed avocado, lettuce, tomato and mayo.

hasMenuItem.name: Mighty Mushroom
hasMenuItem.description: Sautéed mushrooms, double slices of Swiss cheese, mustard and mayo.

hasMenuItem.name: Bourbon BBQ
hasMenuItem.description: Maple bacon, double slices of American cheese, an onion ring, lettuce, tomato, Bourbon BBQ sauce and mayo.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Crisper
hasMenuItem.description: Hand-battered fried chicken drizzled with your choice of sauce (honey garlic, sweet bourbon BBQ, sweet teriyaki, ranch, honey mustard or sweet Thai chilli), lettuce, tomato and mayo on a brioche bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Cheddar BLT
hasMenuItem.description: Marinated grilled chicken breast, maple bacon, lettuce, tomatoes, double slices of Canadian Cheddar and mayo served on a multigrain bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Tennessee Chicken Crunch
hasMenuItem.description: Hand-battered fried chicken in buttermilk and 5 spices, coated in maple Buffalo sauce, Cheddar cheese, coleslaw and ranch dressing on a brioche bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Ricky's Signature Plant-Based Veggie Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Ricky's own 100% plant-based 5oz patty, lettuce, tomato, onions, mayo, mustard and relish on a toasted multigrain bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Homestyle Turkey Dinner
hasMenuItem.description: Slow roasted turkey breast served with made-from-scratch rosemary focaccia apple stuffing, seasonal roasted vegetables, Yukon Gold mashed potatoes, poultry gravy, and cranberry sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Grilled Liver & Onions
hasMenuItem.description: Tender breaded grilled beef liver with gravy, sautéed onions and maple bacon.

hasMenuItem.name: Traditional Lasagna
hasMenuItem.description: Homestyle Italian meat sauce, loaded with Ricotta and Mozzarella, between fresh layered lasagna noodles. Oven baked, topped with shredded Parmesan and Mozzarella. Served with Piccolo Garlic Loaf and caesar salad.

hasMenuItem.name: Deluxe Style Fish & Shrimp Platter
hasMenuItem.description: Kick it up a notch! 2 pieces of hand-battered cod, 10 hand-battered fresh fried shrimp and our crispy skin-on fries. Served with coleslaw, cocktail sauce and tartar sauce.

review.reviewBody: Great food, delivered hot. Thank you:)
I love their food. It's amazing. Try their amazing ginger bowl and also deep dish apple dessert
Philly cheese steak was really good but the cheese was missing.  Food arrived quickly, everything was hot & fresh.
Overall the best option for doordash in the Aldergrove area. They appreciate your business and it shows in the quality of the food delivered. Love the meat lover brekkie bowl, always fantastic:
Personal Banana Cream Pie was fantastic
